passive_1: When struck by an attack, deal 10 magic damage to the attacker and inflict them with 40%  Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds if they are a champion.

motd: Change: Now applies Grevious Wounds even if the damage dealt was completely mitigated by a shield.

passive_1: When struck by an attack, deal 6 magic damage to the attacker and inflict them with 40%  Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds if they are a champion.
When struck by an attack, deal 4 magic damage to the attacker and inflict them with 25%  Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds if they are a champion.
When struck by an attack, deal 3 magic damage to the attacker and inflict them with 30%  Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds if they are a champion.
When struck by an attack, deal 3 magic damage to the attacker and inflict them with 40%  Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds if they are a champion.
When struck by an attack, deal 3 (+ 10% bonus armor) magic damage to the attacker and inflict them with 40%  Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds if they are a champion.
When struck by an attack, deal 3 (+ 10% bonus armor) magic damage to the attacker and inflict them with 40%  Grievous Wounds for 2 seconds if they are a champion.
motd: Hotfix-Bugfix: No longer loses the ability to apply Grievous Wounds if its owner dies.

passive_1: Upon being hit by a basic attack, reflects 3 (+ 10% bonus armor) magic damage and, if they are a champion, inflict them with Grievous Wounds for 1 second.
Upon being hit by a basic attack, reflects 15 magic damage and, if they are a champion, inflict them with Grievous Wounds for 1 second.
Upon being hit by a basic attack, reflects 20 magic damage, inflicting Grievous Wounds on the attacker for 1 second.
